#==============================================Data================================

Fig6 is made by using the script plot_Fig6.gnu. 

Plotted file in the main plot is "diffusion_time.dat" using column 1 and 4. First column is time and fourth column is <r^2>.

#=============================================Codes===============================
"diffusion_time.dat" is generated by the code used in Fig.2A (Ï„=1).
